project.name: SustainOSS
project.description:
I am the main organizer behind SustainOSS, in that I hold the keys for our Zoom, Mailchimp, etc. We run conferences on open source sustainability, and I have been the main host of a podcast on sustaining open source for the last seven~ years. You can see that, here t podcast.sustainoss.org/.

I also maintain hundreds of other open source repositories (only a few really active, though, tbh), and I am one of the organizers for CURIOSS at curioss.org, and the executive director of GNOME foundation.gnome.org.
